last_message: SELECT message, date, country, city FROM entries WHERE tag = ? ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1;
insert_new_entry: INSERT INTO entries (chapter_name, tag, date, country, city, message) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?);
last_message_before_date: SELECT message, date, country, city FROM entries WHERE tag = ? AND entry_id < ( SELECT entry_id FROM entries WHERE tag = ? AND date < ? ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1) ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1;
